description: Emily Jean "Emma" Stone (born November 6, 1988) is an American actress. The recipient of several accolades, including an Academy Award and a Golden Globe Award, she was the world's highest-paid actress in 2017. Stone has appeared in Forbes Celebrity 100 in 2013 and in 2017, she was named by Time magazine as one of the 100 most influential people in the world.
name: Emma Stone
